derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from conjunction, by substitution of the suffix; influenced by obsolete French conjuncture, from Italian congiuntura, based on Latin conjungere 'join together' (see conjoin)

means.word_mean: 1. a critical combination of events or circumstances
